original_text: All the time that Jehoahaz was king of Israel, King Hazael of Syria was cruel to the Israelites.
korean_text: 여호아하스 왕의 시대에 아람 왕 하사엘이 항상 이스라엘을 학대하였으나

sentences.original_text: All the time that Jehoahaz was king of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 여호아하스가 이스라엘 왕이었던 모든 시간 동안

sentences.original_text: King Hazael of Syria was cruel to the Israelites
sentences.korean_translation: 시리아의 하사엘 왕은 이스라엘 백성에게 잔인하게 굴었다
